name: Snake Olympics
description:
GMTK theme: Joined together

You control one snake at a time.
Each snake lives in its own dimension and has to avoid trucks of its color

Be careful : Your obstacles are invisible ! A snake can only see the obstacles of the other snake.

Use F to swap snake and dimension
Press up and down to move your snake

Press E to fullscreen. Press T to cancel fullscreen

Avoid obstacles and collect bonuses. Get those points!
